original_text: David stayed in the wilderness strongholds and in the hills of the Desert of Ziph. Day after day Saul searched for him, but God did not give David into his hands.
korean_text: 다윗이 광야의 요새에도 있었고 또 십 광야 산골에도 머물렀으므로 사울이 매일 찾되 하나님이 그를 그의 손에 넘기지 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: David stayed in the wilderness strongholds
and in the hills of the Desert of Ziph
Day after day Saul searched for him
but God did not give David into his hands
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 다윗을 그의 손에 넘기지 않으셨습니다
